name: Ball Bump 3D - Rush Color Ball
description:
Swipe the ball and get the maximum score, Rise up and do not bump with color blocks.

Drag your finger around to move the fireball. Avoid color enemies of different shape and use white bricks and balls to push through the level. The game consists of hundreds of levels for your joy. First levels are easy for you to get the feel of the game and be 100% sure in your ball movements. After a while, you will need to think more and push your way through enemies.
